content: Once you are up again, you'll find a helpful gold box has been placed by the bed, and you can open the small **Treasure Chest** to claim 3 Antimiasma Powder and 1 Longevity Decoction. If you can't take the hint, it means you're likely to run into a lot of poison-inducing enemies in this area.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Upper_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Upper Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Webbed Hollow'.
The content is as follows:
Once you are up again, you'll find a helpful gold box has been placed by the bed, and you can open the small **Treasure Chest** to claim 3 Antimiasma Powder and 1 Longevity Decoction. If you can't take the hint, it means you're likely to run into a lot of poison-inducing enemies in this area.
